summary: This document outlines the KYC (Know Your Customer) details for Jeffrey Epstein and associated accounts at Deutsche Bank. It includes information about account ownership, the purpose of accounts, and the relationships between Epstein and his financial advisors. The document also highlights the financial activities and expected inflows/outflows related to Epstein's accounts.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey Epstein is identified as a client of Deutsche Bank, seeking to open new accounts for managing funds related to his personal expenses.

persons.name: Paul Morris
persons.context: Paul Morris is the relationship manager handling Epstein's accounts and has previously worked with him at JP Morgan.

persons.name: Harry Beller
persons.context: Harry Beller is mentioned as a contact person related to Epstein's accounts, providing financial oversight.

persons.name: Brian M. Biggar
persons.context: Brian M. Biggar is noted as an approving authority for the KYC documentation related to Epstein.

persons.name: Janice Franklin
persons.context: Janice Franklin is mentioned as a compliance officer who signed off on the KYC documentation.

connections.description: Paul Morris is the relationship manager for Jeffrey Epstein at Deutsche Bank, having previously worked with him at JP Morgan.
Harry Beller is involved in the financial management of Epstein's accounts.
Both are involved in managing Epstein's financial affairs.

events.title: Client Meeting
events.description: A meeting took place between Paul Morris and Jeffrey Epstein to discuss account management.

events.title: KYC Approval

locations: 6100 Red Hock Quarter, B3 St Thomas 00802 USVI
keyFacts: Jeffrey Epstein is a client of Deutsche Bank, seeking to open new accounts for managing personal expenses.
Paul Morris has a history of working with Epstein at JP Morgan before managing his accounts at Deutsche Bank.
Harry Beller is involved in the financial oversight of Epstein's accounts.
The accounts are intended to cover costs associated with running Epstein's homes.
The KYC documentation indicates Epstein's estimated net worth is between $100 million and $500 million.
